analysis.description:

ARISTO.balanceOf.owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/2/0x7cbc8ee27ffdba230dd316160ea01d565f17aacb.sol#143-144) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/2/0x7cbc8ee27ffdba230dd316160ea01d565f17aacb.sol#39)
